titleStmt.title: A second vindication of a disciplinary, anti-Erastian, orthodox free-admission to the Lords-Supper; or, The state of this controversie revised and proposed: for the fuller understanding of the most, as to the grounds whereon it stands; and more especially for the ease, and clearer proceeding of those, that shall write about it, whether for it, or against it. / By John Humfrey, min: of Froome.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.L. for E. Blackmore at the Angel in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
